Description: The conditional expression  "Char.IsWhiteSpace(s[0])                  || Char.IsWhiteSpace(s[s.Length - 1])                  || s.Contains(Comma)                  || s.Contains(Quote)                  || s.Contains(Environment.NewLine)"  is complex.

The following statement contains a magic number: if (null == data)              {                  return null;              }              else              {                  var sb = new StringBuilder(data.Length * 2);                  foreach (byte b in data)                  {                      sb.AppendFormat("{0:x2}"' b);                  }                    return sb.ToString();              }
